prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Reed, Piano, Pipe, Strings, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Guitar, Drums, Reed, Piano, Pipe, and Strings, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Reed, Piano, Pipe, and Strings, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
Guitar, Drums, Reed, Piano, Pipe, and Strings are all present in this song, yet Bass is absent.
